introduction.title: Welcome to SendaSnap
introduction.description: SendaSnap is a comprehensive mobile application designed for vehicle management, task scheduling, and team collaboration. This manual will guide you through all features and help you get the most out of the app.

content.title: Installing the App
details: Download SendaSnap from the Google Play Store

content.title: Creating an Account
details: Open the app and tap 'Sign Up' or 'Create Account'
Enter your email address and create a secure password
Fill in your personal information (name, etc.)

content.title: Logging In
details: Enter your email address and password
Optionally check 'Remember Me' to stay logged in

content.title: Granting Permissions
details: Camera Permission: Required for capturing vehicle photos
Storage Permission: Required for accessing gallery images and saving files
Notifications: Required for receiving task reminders and chat messages
Grant permissions when prompted for the best experience

content.name: Schedule

steps.title: Access Vehicle Search
steps.description: From the Home screen, locate the search bar at the top

steps.title: Enter Search Criteria
steps.description: Type the chassis number or other vehicle identifier in the search field

steps.title: View Results
steps.description: Tap on a vehicle from the search results to view detailed information

steps.title: Search History
steps.description: Previously searched vehicles appear in the recent vehicles section for quick access

steps.title: View Vehicle Information
steps.description: After selecting a vehicle, view comprehensive details including specifications, history, and related information

steps.title: Add Vehicle Photos
steps.description: Tap the camera icon to capture or select photos for vehicle documentation

steps.title: Photo Options
steps.description: Choose to take a new photo with camera or select from gallery. Photos are automatically saved and associated with the vehicle

sections.description: Access your recently viewed vehicles from the Home screen. Tap any vehicle to view its details again.

steps.title: Navigate to Schedule
steps.description: Tap the 'Schedule' tab in the bottom navigation bar

steps.title: Add New Schedule
steps.description: Tap the '+' or 'Add Schedule' button to create a new schedule

steps.title: Fill Schedule Details
steps.description: Enter schedule title, description, date, time, and other relevant information

steps.title: Assign Team Members
steps.description: Select team members who should be assigned to this schedule

steps.title: Add Attachments
steps.description: Optionally attach files, images, or documents related to the schedule

steps.title: Set Priority
steps.description: Choose priority level (High, Normal, Low) for the schedule

steps.title: Save Schedule
steps.description: Tap 'Save' or 'Create' to save the schedule. Team members will be notified

steps.title: Schedule List
steps.description: View all your schedules in the Schedule tab, organized by date

steps.title: Filter Schedules
steps.description: Filter schedules by status (Pending, In Progress, Completed), priority, or date range

steps.title: Schedule Details
steps.description: Tap on any schedule to view full details, assigned members, attachments, and chat discussions

steps.title: Update Task Status
steps.description: From schedule details, update task progress and mark tasks as complete

steps.title: Edit Tasks
steps.description: Tap the edit icon to modify task details, assignments, or priority

steps.title: Delete Tasks
steps.description: Swipe left or use the delete option to remove tasks (if you have permission)

sections.description: Receive push notifications for task assignments, reminders, and updates. Notifications appear in the app and as system notifications.

steps.title: Access Chat
steps.description: From a schedule detail page, tap the chat icon or message button to start a group chat

steps.title: Individual Chat
steps.description: Access contacts or team members list to start one-on-one conversations

steps.title: Group Chat
steps.description: Group chats are automatically created for schedules, including all assigned team members

steps.title: Text Messages
steps.description: Type your message in the input field at the bottom and tap the send button

steps.title: Send Images
steps.description: Tap the attachment icon, select 'Gallery' or 'Camera', choose or capture an image, and send

steps.title: Send Files
steps.description: Tap the attachment icon, select 'File', choose a file from your device, and send

steps.title: View Sent Messages
steps.description: All sent messages appear in the chat with timestamps. Images and files are displayed inline

features.description: Messages are delivered instantly to all participants
Unread messages are highlighted with badges and notifications
All chat messages are saved and accessible for future reference
Receive push notifications when new messages arrive, even when the app is closed

steps.title: View Attachments
steps.description: Tap on any image or file in the chat to view or download it

steps.title: Image Compression
steps.description: Images are automatically compressed before upload to save bandwidth

steps.title: File Size Limits
steps.description: Images: Maximum 5MB, Files: Maximum 10MB. Larger files will be rejected

steps.title: Access Profile
steps.description: Tap the 'Profile' tab in the bottom navigation bar

steps.title: Profile Information
steps.description: View your name, email, and other account details

options.description: Update your personal information and profile details
Update your account password for security
Sign out of your account. Use the logout option in the toolbar menu

steps.title: Access History
steps.description: Navigate to History from the navigation drawer or home screen

steps.title: Recent Searches
steps.description: View your recent vehicle searches with timestamps

steps.title: Quick Access
steps.description: Tap on any history item to quickly access that vehicle again

tips.description: Use the recent vehicles section on the home screen for quick access to frequently viewed vehicles
Set task priorities to help organize your workflow. High priority tasks appear first
Take photos directly from the vehicle details screen for instant documentation without leaving the app

The app provides haptic feedback for better interaction. Feel the vibration when tapping buttons

questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' option on the login screen. Enter your email address and follow the instructions sent to your email.

questions.question: Can I use the app offline?
questions.answer: Limited offline functionality is available for recently viewed vehicles and cached data. Full features require an internet connection.

questions.question: How many team members can be in a group chat?
questions.answer: Group chats can include all team members assigned to a schedule. There is no specific limit, but performance may vary with very large groups.

questions.question: What file types can I attach?
questions.answer: You can attach images (JPG, PNG) and various file types. Images are limited to 5MB and other files to 10MB.

questions.question: How do I delete a schedule or task?
questions.answer: Open the schedule details, tap the edit/delete option. Note that deletion may require appropriate permissions.

questions.question: Can I change my email address?
questions.answer: Email changes should be done through your account settings in the Profile section, if available, or contact support.

questions.question: Why are my images compressed?
questions.answer: Images are automatically compressed before upload to optimize bandwidth usage and reduce storage costs while maintaining acceptable quality.

questions.question: How do I report a bug or issue?
questions.answer: Contact support through the app's About section or use the contact information provided in the app settings.

questions.question: Can I customize notifications?
questions.answer: Notification settings can be adjusted through your device settings. App-specific notification preferences may be available in future updates.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, SendaSnap uses industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your information. All data is securely stored and transmitted.
